testcase.name: given valid id and PatientRequestDto when updatePatient then returns PatientResponseDto
given existing patient user in createPatient then throws DuplicateResourceException
given valid id when getPatientById then returns PatientResponseDto
craeting a new patient for existing user
given not found user when getAppointmentsByPatientId then throws ResourceNotFoundException
given patient with appointments not canceled when deletePatient then throws ADSIllegalStateException
given duplicate email in updatePatient then throws DuplicateResourceException
given mismatched username when getAppointmentsByPatientId then throws AccessDeniedException
given patient not found in updatePatient then throws ResourceNotFoundException
given invalid id when getPatientById then throws ResourceNotFoundException
given valid paging when getAllPatients then returns paged response
given valid userDetails and patientId when getAppointmentsByPatientId then returns appointments page
given valid id with no appointments when deletePatient then deleted successfully
given patient not found in deletePatient then throws ResourceNotFoundException
